message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI 

This paper proposes a novel approach to reconstructing intensity images from event streams using a recurrent neural network and a perceptual loss. The paper focuses on the application of event cameras for high-speed and high dynamic range video, which suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) and robotics (cs.RO) sub-categories. The use of machine learning techniques for image reconstruction also suggests that the paper may belong to the machine learning (cs.LG), neural networks (cs.NE), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories.
